definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: of Moabite cities (cf. [[קר]] = city MI:11, 12, 24, pl. [[קרן]] 1:29);—LXX usu. om., or reads to\ tei=cov;—
[[מוֹאָב]] ´[[ק]]: Is 15:1, poss. Rabba, S. of Arnon, v. Buhl:Geogr.270.

[[חֶ֫רֶשׂ]] ´[[ק]]: Je 48:31, Je 48:36, [[חָָרֶשׂ]] ´[[ק]]: Is 16:11 = [[חֲרֶ֫שֶׂת]] ´[[ק]]: Is 16:7, [[חֲדָָשֶׂת]] ´[[ק]]: 2Ki 3:25 (Gi [[חֲרָָשֶׁת]] ´[[ק]]:), perh. Kerak, S. of Rabba, v. Buhl:lb., and cp. (on Kerak) Palmer:Des. of Ex. ii. 472 Dowling:PEQ. Oct. 1896, 327, esp. Mauss in de Luynes:Voyage à la Mer Morte (1864), ii. 106 ff., iii (Atlax, ad fin.), 13 pl.
